meanings.sent1: That numpty always forgets his keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a numpty and double-check your work.
meanings.sent3: The numpty tried to use a fork as a comb.
meanings.sent4: He's such a numpty, he's like a fish riding a bicycle.
meanings.sent5: The image of a numpty is like a clown without a circus.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't numpty your way through this project.
meanings.sent2: She tends to numpty when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: He numptied his way into trouble by ignoring the warning signs.
meanings.sent4: Trying to fix the computer without any knowledge just numpties the situation.
meanings.sent5: Her attempt to parallel park was a perfect example of how not to numpty.
